desc: Hazel Oak Farms offers an online retail space for high-end, custom furniture. We work closely with customers to create a variety of handmade home furniture and decor items that fit your needs. The style of our furniture and home decor items are modern, farmhouse, and industrial in style. Every piece is handmade by us.

layout.text: Handcrafted wood furniture you make your own with a variety of wood types and finishes
